title: New York City Transformers
name: New York City Transformers
description:
A Map by Enauman

This map shows locations of all recordings made for &quot;Concurrence of electrical transformers in several locations,&quot; by me, Erik Nauman.

properties.name: 530 2nd street
properties.description: Posted by Enauman530 2nd Street, Brooklyn, NY 112154 recordings of fluorescent lights; laundry room, 4th floor (2), 6th floor, I used to live here

properties.name: 5th Avenue at 85th street
properties.description: Posted by Enaumanrecording of a transformer at the entrance to Central Park near the reservoir

properties.name: 5th Avenue at 97th street
properties.description: Posted by Enaumanrecording of a transformer just inside a park entrance

properties.name: 7th Ave. D train station
properties.description: Posted by Enauman7th Ave. D train stationTransformer in this station and train approaching in the recording. The D train doesn\'t come here any more, but pre-9/11 it did.

properties.name: Borough Hall station
properties.description: Posted by EnaumanJoralomon and Court st, Brooklyn, NYtwo recordings of transformer boxes for fluorescent lights made here, both on 2/3 train platform.

properties.name: Central Park West at 63rd street
properties.description: Posted by Enauman 2 recordings of an electrical transformer, probably for fluorescent lights in the subway below?

properties.name: Central Park West at the Museum of Natural History
properties.description: Posted by Enauman  recording of a fluorescent light transformer across the street from the museum

properties.name: Chambers Street station
properties.description: Posted by Enaumantransformer box for fluorescent lights in 2/3 station.

properties.name: F train, 7th Ave. station
properties.description: Posted by Enauman2 recordings; one of the light transformer at turnstile and one at top of stairs

properties.name: MTA substation
properties.description: Posted by Enaumanrecording of a loud transformer building servicing the MTA

properties.name: Prospect Park
properties.description: Posted by Enauman stepdown transformer, enclosed in a chain link fence

properties.name: The Tombstone in The Ramble, Central Park
properties.description: Posted by Enauman recording of a transformer named "The Tombstone" by birdwatchers

properties.name: Trevor Day School: elementary
properties.description: Posted by Enauman recording of fluorescent light in boys bathroom

properties.name: Trevor Day School: kindergarten
properties.description: Posted by Enauman fluorescent light in the kindergarten hallway, teachers conversing in nearby room
